docs.snippet: The announcement came as Facebook announced a tripling in its quarterly profit to $1.5 billion, with sales up 52 percent.

headline.print_headline: Facebook Plans New Stock Class  to Solidify Zuckerberg’s Control
headline.main: Facebook Plans New Stock Class to Solidify Mark Zuckerberg’s Control

docs.abstract: Facebook plans to introduce new class of stock, known as C shares, which would allow founder Mark Zuckerberg to remain in charge even as he gives away majority of his holdings to charity.
